title: Here’s a MacBook and iPad accessory that could relieve your tech neck
content:
Macworld

While we love our MacBooks, we don’t love how there are only USB-C inputs … or how staring down at the screen makes our necks ache at the end of the day. Here’s an easy fix to both problems: this laptop stand that doubles as an 8-in-1 hub.

The CASA HUB is the ultimate office accessory, offering a 360º adjustable view, a sleek aluminum design, and multiple connectivity options to make your workday go more smoothly. You can save 22% and grab your MacBook or iPad stand for $99.99 (reg. $129).

The price might seem a little steep, but the CASA HUB isn’t one of those cheap stand-and-hub hybrids you’ve seen elsewhere. This one combines both elegantly, relieving you of tech neck while you’re designing or coding with its adjustable stand.

To improve your connectivity, plug your MacBook or iPad into the host cable and choose one (or all) of the hub’s connections. Use the USB-C PD charging to power your MacBook during your 9-5, or the USB-A, microSD, and SD card slots to transfer photos and files seamlessly—and never rely on adapters again.

Save 22% now and grab the CASA HUB 360 laptop stand and hub for just $99.99. Act while supplies last!
